Public Remarks: This magnificent Executive Home designed & built by renowned JHD Developments Ltd. in a prestigious Point Grey location. This home has gorgeous millwork, oak h/w floors, arch mouldings, & curved wood steps with custom paneling. Main floor features 10 ceilings and an Italian marble fireplace. The kitchen includes a wok kitchen, 48 Sub-Zero fridge, Wolf oven, range & cooktop. Top floor offers 4 bedrooms includes a spa-like master ensuite with steam shower & freestanding tub. The basement offers a media room with 7.1 SS, Wet bar with backlit Onyx, & temp controlled Wine Cellar. Rooftop deck offers water views. This home includes Control4 automated lighting & home audio, monitored security system, A/C, HRV, & a 3-car garage. 2-5-10 warranty.

This 'Green' home features radiant floor heating, air conditioning, solar power, multi stage drinking water filtration system, elevator, and a 60ft ozone indoor lap pool! Public Remarks: Beautiful landscaping! Almost 6,000 sq.ft. exquisite family home location on a 11,867 sq.ft. level lot. The interior is finished to a high standard featuring gorgeous custom millwork. On the main level, an impressive layout that features a palatial two-storey vaulted great room, foyer, study, formal dining room and laundry room. The gourmet kitchen is designed around a 12' island and includes premium appliances. Library, master suite plus three ensuite bedrooms on the upper level. On the lower level you'll find a secondary laundry room, ensuite bedroom, full bar and games area, red velvet themed theatre and serene spa room. Arcon Rock and waterscape backyard. Close to school, shopping, UBC, airport and Richmond.
